goal: We only got one minute to save christmas
description: Name as many festive words as you can within 60s (duel with your partner)

goal: We wish you a merry christmas!

Judge if a donation is naughty or nice
Only talk in question for the entire intermission

goal: I am thou and thou art I
description: Pretend to be your co-host
